name: VR Sky Walk
description:
Playing "VR Sky Walk", you will embark on a different game journey. This is an immersive VR game, which is completely designed for VR experience. Players will play an extreme sports enthusiast in the game, walking on the top of the city.

main features
Real scenes-using high-precision models to show real scenes in front of your eyes through VR, allowing you to see our world from a new perspective.

Extreme breakthrough-high altitude, crumbling suspension bridge, limited time and other thrilling elements, which will stimulate the senses and give you an unstoppable sense of invigoration.


The gameplay is fun-bid farewell to the boring gameplay. Combining a variety of gameplay, let you have a constant sense of freshness during the game,

Game operation method
In order to have a better gaming experience, this game currently only supports the VR version.
